en: June Mazilee Miles standing on the sideboard of a Green Hill Farms milk delivery truck

This photograph is titled, "June Mazilee Miles standing on the sideboard of a Green Hill Farms milk delivery truck". Written on the back of the photo: Green Hill Farms imported registered Jersey cattle from the island of Jersey and produced and bottled milk on the farm. The milk was delivered to homes in the Donelson and Nashville area in trucks such as these. In this 1931 photo is June Mazilee Miles, four-year-old daughter of Green Hill Farms manager, Murray T. Miles, Sr.
Era 8 - The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945)
